title: Launching SkylerDavila.com
content:
## Hello world!

This is the first note on **SkylerDavila.com**. I'm building a home for my experiments, writing, and project drops.

- Expect bite-sized learnings and prototypes.
- Every post ships with source code or a demo.
- Feedback is always welcome â€” reach out via GitHub or email.

Stay tuned for more soon.
